section.p: The uninstallation of consists of the following steps:

ol.li: Stop the application server domains related to .
Delete the shared directory for the master search index.
Delete the databases, bss and bssjms, and uninstall the database management system and the application server, if you no longer need them for other purposes.
Undeploy the BIRT report engine, and uninstall the application server used for BIRT, if you no longer need it for other purposes.

section.p: For details on how to proceed, refer to the documentation of the database management system and the application server.
